properties.name: validator.enabled.master-link-in-augmentation-validator.cm-external-channel
properties.description: If false, the master link validator for augmented categories is disabled.

properties.name: validator.enabled.master-link-in-augmentation-validator.cm-external-product
properties.description: If false, the master link validator for augmented products is disabled.

properties.name: validator.enabled.master-link-in-augmentation-validator.cm-external-page
properties.description: If false, the master link validator for augmented pages is disabled.

properties.name: master-link-in-augmentation-validator.severity
properties.description: The severity from which a master link validator for augmenting contents displays issues.

properties.name: master-link-in-augmentation-validator.max-issues
properties.description: The max number of issues the master link validator for augmenting contents is issueing.
